div.p: By Governor Evers' extended Safer at Home order, Kohler Schools’ closure remains in effect until the end of this school year. Kohler Kare also remains closed. In an effort to prevent the community spread of COVID-19, the school and district offices and facilities are closed to the public through May 26. All necessary business will only be conducted electronically and by phone. All other business is suspended.
